Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Ballistics computer calculation error. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N - Not established
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
